case_description: Global Retail Services terminated a 3-year service contract with Local IT Company after 14 months without providing the mandatory 90-day notice specified in contract. Local IT Company suffered immediate business losses including inability to pay 20 employees and loss of projected revenue. They are seeking damages for breach of contract and lost business opportunities.
legal_question: What damages can be claimed for breach of service contract when termination occurs without contractual notice? How are business losses and employee costs calculated under Indian Contract Act, 1872?
